final_evaluation_user1.verbatim_quality: dialogue parfaitement compréhensible du début à la fin.

final_evaluation_user2.verbatim_quality: pretty good. i felt like i was actually about to get fired from my job. granted, it wouldn't hold up in court, but it certainly helps get the basic message across
final_evaluation_user2.particular_problems: at one point my boss started talking about 'surgery'. i know that can't be right
